website_summaries.verdict: This simple two slot option looks smart and toasts evenly, all at an extremely affordable price.
pros: The extra-wide slots are perfect for bagels or thick slices of bread
Bagel setting toasts just one side of the bread
Seven shade settings give you toast just how you like it
cons: Defrost function leaves something to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Crumb tray troubles
customer_reviews.text: The first one I recieved, the crumb tray would not stay inside the toaster. I asked if others had this problem and it seemed maybe I got a defective one. I sent it back and they sent me a replacement. The replacement came quickly, but it had the opposite problem, the crumb tray would not come out of the toaster. It was jammed. I was a bit annoyed, but decided to keep it since I rarely remove the tray. I do like the wide slots, cool touch, and even cooking. I generally leave it on the three. I would recommend this toaster for the most part, just beware the crumb tray. Seems like something that could be easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick, even toast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toaster! It was easy to unbox, set up, and figure out how to use the controls. It is very self explanatory machine, any one could figure out how to use it just by looking at it. Compared to our old toaster, it toasts so quickly! the toasting is very even across the bread. Toast is a BIG staple in our house, and I wish I had purchased this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Thefrenchpig

customer_reviews.title: Works great but takes forever to toast!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, toasts the entire slice evenly, we can now make 4 slices at a time! The down side, it takes what seems like forever to toast! Even at half setting. But it does a great job. Where other toasters seem to only toast the center area of the slice, this one evenly toasts the entire slice, even the crust.
customer_reviews.author: Wal92tt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. We have only used it a couple times but setting it to a 2 makes a perfect light golden and a slight crunch piece of toast.
customer_reviews.author: Crista Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bright shiny gleam this toaster had. I wanted a four slicer with enough grills to toast bagels and waffles. The lighted control buttons makes it extra easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Live this toaster. I would have given it a straight 5 star rating except one of the four slice spots toasts a little uneven. Honestly, I could care less about that for all intent purposes. It's easy to use, doesn't show fingerprints, cleans easy. I love the square shape rather than long. Great toaster for the price.. oh only one other small thing. The cord is located closer to the front on the side rather than the rear. But it can be hidden underneath. I would purchase it again without question.
customer_reviews.author: Luvshopin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toaster.
customer_reviews.text: What a nice toaster. My old one my kids got me some 20yrs ago bit the dust. This toaster is so much nicer and matches most of my appliances. I came close to pulling out my two slice we called the "Flintstone toaster" which is 40yrs old but I didn't want the toast flying across the kitchen. It can stay in our trailer. Easy operation and I love the cancelation button. Browns the bread perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but also cheap
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this may not bother you, but I find it unacceptable. This toaster heats one side of the toast almost twice as hot as the other side, so your toast will come out dark on one side and light on the other. I thought the first model I received was defective, so I returned it for another, both did this.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi W

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to repair cold heat wires
customer_reviews.text: First impression: not in love. About 1/3 of the heat wires stayed cold. Unplugged and adjusted with a thin knife. So far so good. Used homemade whole wheat cinnamon raisin bread (Josey Baker Bread recipe) for test run. The toast of my dreams popped up. Conclusion: no one, not Cuisanart, B&D, Oster or Breva makes a reliable toaster anymore and in these trying times, it has never been truer that In Toast There Is Strength.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Should get zero stars. First time I used this toaster the right side shorts out and trips breaker. Left side doesn't work at all. I threw out the original box which was a mistake never thinking the toaster wouldn't work. Hopefully I will get a credit.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable toast machine, stainless steel cover, easy clean up, faster toast time, recommend
customer_reviews.author: ke xiang

customer_reviews.title: If you need a toaster, buy this one
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new toaster, and I purchased this one based on the reviews. I wanted something that was visually pleasing too, since we use the toaster every morning. This is very sleek and modern. Love the look. The toasting feature works well. I haven’t had to deal with burnt toast/waffles/etc. The cancel button is a nice feature, especially as it lights up in a blue color. The crumb try is the only complaint. It doesn’t go fully into the toaster. It hangs out by a half inch or so. Maybe that’s the way it’s supposed to be. Maybe not. It wasn’t enough of a reason for me to send this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: BREVO 2-Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster but for the life of me I do not know why they put the cord on the side. I have to push it to the back so not to expose the cord because mine is facing with the controls in the front. I little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferdon

customer_reviews.title: Makes toast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster to replace a much older T-Fal toaster that died. I like the clean unpretentious appearance and compact dimensions. It makes toast just as well as the old T-Fal for a fraction of the price. My only suggestion for improvement would be to increase the amount of lift you can apply to the lever when removing your toast if it isn't very tall. Only time will tell if this toaster is as durable as the T-Fal, which had served me for at least a dozen years.
customer_reviews.author: Cognitive

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. I bought it for my sister for Christmas and it broke within the first two weeks. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Decent toaster
customer_reviews.text: It toasts pretty well. The lever could be a little better but it works. Sometimes one side gets stuck but a little jiggle works it out.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Replacement failing
customer_reviews.text: Started. Toasting unevenly and burning patts of toast Update: costomer service sent a replacement unit, without any questions, new one works exceedingly well, If it lasts then 5 stars Update : is 19 months old now. Was used regularly but not daily, now burning one side, and under toasting the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Madred

customer_reviews.title: English muffins lost a star
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this toaster. It is sleek, nice looking and work well for everything but English muffins. I am unable to get the nice brown crust on those nooks and crannies, which I love to butter. Aside from that, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fired Up

customer_reviews.title: as pictured. awesome toaster, and shes pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is great, and looks sharp. BOTH sides work equally... My last double toaster the one side wouldn't stay down. Quick delivery, well packaged and secure. Should cost more, but I'm happy it doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: It will toast a slice of bread.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to toast four slices at one time. Can be a little inconsistent in toasting I do not recommend toasting only one slice. Time of toasting seems all right, Hard to change the darkness of the toaster as it has a turn right or left control, but it never seems to change the color. I do like the reheat feature. Overall too pricy for what it is((((
customer_reviews.author: TEXAS JIM 5978

customer_reviews.title: Sad online purchase
customer_reviews.text: A classic piece of Chinese-made junk. Took it out of the box, plugged it in, wouldn't hold the bread down. Threw it in the trash. Is there an American-made toaster?
customer_reviews.author: Bob Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 30 days...
customer_reviews.text: I received the toaster on Sept 29th. It was pretty enough. It toasted bread, but the levers felt weak On Oct 29th both levers stopped working. Returned, refunded and ordered something else. Hoping for better luck next time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie N Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a toaster for a while now and finally decided on this one. I absolutely Love this toaster. Super easy to use and easy to clean. Love how wide the slots are.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast every time
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. Slots are big enough for all types of bread including bagles. Toasts evenly which is terrific. It does take a lot longer to toast than an average toaster but that's how you get even toasting. One thing to note is that this thing is a monster compared to my other toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Civicduty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely toaster, unique in appearance and I wanted something different from what I see in every store. Our final stainless steel item which is nice when you have all stainless appliances and it is nice to match them with the smaller counter items.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever. Toasts quickly and evenly, and looks really nice on the counter. I like the pop up button as well. Had a kitchen aid for years, that cost more, took forever to toast, and the toast was always half done. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng Liang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get a new toaster that could handle a variety of functions, including a bagel setting, but sadly I was only able to use the toaster once, as the button for the bagel setting stayed permanently pushed. No amount of jiggling could get the button unstuck. Unless I wanted to only eat toasted bagels for the rest of eternity, I had no choice but to return the toaster. While the toaster looked great on my countertop, the quality was obviously lacking.
customer_reviews.author: KCollins

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster several days after buying a broken toaster from another Amazon vendor. This one arrived broken too. The latch that holds the bread crumb drawer closed was broken. The drawer is spring loaded and won't stay shut. Otherwise, this toaster looks nice. The levers seem sturdy and all of the elements heated up when the levers were depressed. It's probably a good toaster, but I can't say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Does Just What A Toaster Should Do
customer_reviews.text: And it nicely stores directly above in an upper cabinet, out of sight when not in use. After a good month of use, we recommend this 'minor' appliance...and we consider it an excellent value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again 😰
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews and settled on this toaster, I would not purchase again. It just doesn’t toast well . That is all kinda bummed that I’ll have to spend an ungodly amount of money to get a good toaster
customer_reviews.author: Holley A Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the family,and they love it.I have a big toast and it’s really inconvenient.. but this not big but just right. Many options that you can pick. Easy to control the temperature and time. either bread or bagel,after toasted and with some butter or cream cheese,it was soooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, toaster that also browns evenly in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Randy T.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is really good, it works perfect since the first time, you can get excellent results with thin and small bread slices as well with thick and big ones. I definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kokoa

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GOOD  I WOULD GIVE THIS 5 STARS BUT IT WOULD NOT LET ME  ITS 5 STARS ALL DAY LONG
customer_reviews.text: SUPRIZED ME ITS GOOD QUALITY WORKS REALLY GOOD I WOULD GIVE THIS 5 STARS BUT IT WOULD NOT LET ME ITS 5 STARS ALL DAY LONG
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love the stainless steel look- nice and shiny, modern looking. Toasts everything well, tho it may take a little longer than some others I've had. Every button you need for toasting ( bagel, canceling, etc). Overall, quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Does its job nicely !!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Toaster. A regular toast only takes 2 minutes and it is even on both sides. The design is simple and elegant, and it looks so nice in my modern kitchen. It does what it claims to do, and that too nicely. The wide slots are great for bagels, and works on skinnier slices of toast too. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: piha

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Simple Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sleek and modern. I can't complain...great price. I did shop around even at various stores.. I was looking for something inexpensive and simple in design. This is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Web Cat

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this toaster doesn’t get super hot on the outside. It definitely generates some heat, but my previous toaster was nuclear hot so this is a pleasant change.
customer_reviews.author: Eggdog

customer_reviews.title: Great look but not performance.
customer_reviews.text: Second one, sending back. First was dented and this one timer not working. Buy at your own risk. Replacement for first Brewo come very quick, but unfortunately that is the only good about this transaction.
customer_reviews.author: gutek

customer_reviews.title: Looks classy, makes great toast!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking..makes toast perfectly, the top has recessed grooves which collect crumbs, so it does require constant cleaning of the grooves. Still worth the trade off for its attractiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Skwire

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Convenient and fast
customer_reviews.text: I personally like this brand bread banking machine. Because it is easy to use. One year ago my friend gave me. a piece because this time the helper was broken by me. So I went to buy another one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst toaster in the world
customer_reviews.text: The lever seems pretty cheap, and I wondering how long it will last. Aesthetically, its nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: lol be this toaster! We toast bagels, sliced bread and English muffins. Perfect every time..
customer_reviews.author: Diane Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it advertises
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great on the kitchen counter. The warming rack and the defrost are perfect for toaster strudles in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The controls are all crooked and have no resistance when turning.
customer_reviews.author: Waly

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Toast's bread real good,but doesn't toast bagels that well on the bagel setting. Also they don't have the handle on the whole defrost thing either!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen P

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever...and I like toast, English muffins and bagels. Never burns up your food. Has a reheat feature and other useful settings. Get your day started off right...just add coffee.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We just made toast this morning. Very easy, very smooth and the toast was great. Will recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We weren't looking for anything fancy or crazy, just a good toaster for the times we need one. Looks nice, works well. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ecmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like picture
customer_reviews.text: Heats very well and looks absolutely great in my kitchen. Thanks Brevo :)
customer_reviews.author: CatherineGrace

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works great no matter what I toast!
customer_reviews.text: So far there is nothing I dislike about this toaster. I have been really pleased with it. It is well made, looks great, and works well no matter what I toast. Really good value for the money..a win win purchase, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Star Ibis-Meigs

customer_reviews.title: Nice practical toast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking toast with extra wide slices, no need to squeeze in my bagels anymore, does it's job and super easy to clean, good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: It is a toaster
customer_reviews.text: The lettering on the front, for the settings was skewed to the left at the bottom. Not worth sending back. Rim around where you put the toast collects crumbs. Toasts well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Karyn Breznau

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We use this toaster in our work kitchen so it's available to 200 people. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: nbkfw76linda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Received item and had loose carriage assembly inside toaster Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Z

customer_reviews.title: WImpy Spring
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is ok for a inexpensive unit. It is really slow to toast very very slow. And the spring is wimpy so when toasting bagels the bagel does not return up all the way. Nice features - all in all, its ok
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ostertag

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Toast
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it with setting I the middle, both slices and both sides came out the same and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ziem

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look. It is just as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster ever..
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I have ever owned. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell D. Caauwe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster for the price. Stylish and easy to clean. Works great for bagels
customer_reviews.author: Big Wave

customer_reviews.title: Solid appliance
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Even and consistent with every use. Sharp look, easy to use. Great for bagels !
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Moulesong

customer_reviews.title: Very very short lifecycle
customer_reviews.text: A couple of months ago, one side of the heating wire was gone. And the other heating wire does not increase enough heat and finally, I had to throw this out and order a new toaster. Very very poor quality. I have been using this toaster about eight months.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoung-Yun Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This basic white toaster has all the features I want, Bagel, Defrost, Reheat ,and Toast. From bagels to bread and everything inbetween, we've been very satisfied with the unit. Amazon had the best price which is why we purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyenchen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good, convenient and practical. In the morning, I use this to make breakfast and toast for my children. It's great. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ying yun gao

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster. After six months, the lever on one side quit working. It would not stay down. I emailed customer service and received a new toaster within 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Crumb Tray
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the toaster and the crumb tray would not remain closed. Returned it and reordered another. The second one also came with a defective tray.
customer_reviews.author: Rey V

customer_reviews.title: Burned toast!!
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is fine, but the browning control does not work. have contacted the company and zero response.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this toaster for a while and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bishop

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked this toaster at first. Great price and did the trick. However, I purchased this mid December and it already broke.... won’t be buying a new one since it only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Harbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good, however one side does not hold the bread or bagel down to toast. Realized after a month. I hope they can remedy my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The crumb tray does not stay in and it toast more on one side of the bread than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: All four spaces toast great.
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! works great! and looks very nice great quality. I just got it about 2 mos. ago hope it lasts for a long time . I have made toast, bagals and frozen waffles and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that after I toast my Bread, Ican Keep it WARM. My kids love that too. I used it for Toasting BREAD.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Ray

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this toaster for less than a year and it is already burning food while on the lowest setting. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson W Turner

customer_reviews.title: Really like this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Browns toast evenly, pops up the toast so you can reach it. I also like the cord guide on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and easy use
customer_reviews.text: Good item for my kitchen, easy use and toast. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: yang

customer_reviews.title: looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Does its job well and holds even large/thick oat breads
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Evenly toasts!  Doesn't just toast part of the bread.
customer_reviews.text: Like the cord length. The bagel option works as expected - toasts the bagel on one side.
customer_reviews.author: RHC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The toaster arrived broken. It hests up but the latch does not stay down.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Crumb tray does not latch and the cord does not stow easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good toaster
customer_reviews.text: It did what it was designed to do. Fantastic Toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Shnate Shnenam

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 4-slice toaster in September, 2018, to replace a ~10 year old T-Fal (which was great!). I don't use the toaster every day. Today, I depressed the lever one the left side - but the bread holder will not stay down. I removed the trays to clean the crumbs...there weren't many, but this did not solve the problem. If you want a toaster that works longer than 4 months, don't buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Life is good!

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy prodcut
customer_reviews.text: Received a dud. The trigger mechanism wouldn’t stay down and when it actually would click, it toasted very poorly and weakly. Seeing as it’s a toaster and has one job, it was too much of a hassle to keep. Didn’t even want to exchange it out of fear of receiving another dud. Went with a different company completely.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality for $49
customer_reviews.text: Not put together well at all and out of the box has noticeable scuffs in the stainless steel. Where plastic meets stainless steel the joints are uneven. I'm on the fence about returning it. Update: About 30% of the heating elements don't work so the edges are burnt and barely toasted in the center. The right side toasts different than left due to the center elements hardly working on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Cooking frozen waffles were even worse. STEER CLEAR of this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her new apartment. Found out that even when on highest setting, it doesn't brown toast. All it does is dry it out. Cooking frozen waffles were even worse. STEER CLEAR of this toaster! It doesn't know what toast means!
customer_reviews.author: jesstone

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster - but a little over powered
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that I purchased this toaster primarily based on its looks. I just recently finished remodeling my kitchen, and wanted some prettier appliances to adorn my new countertops. This unit definitely does great in the aesthetic department - even my friends have complimented it when they've come over to visit (how often does someone compliment your toaster??) I did take off a star because I have noticed that the toaster's power settings are a little useless, as anything above a 2 will burn your bread. I do wish that it wasn't so sensitive, but its a relatively trivial problem in the world of toasters.
customer_reviews.author: John Duffet

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Had to give at least 1 star to post this review. Just a waste of money! Bought for a new house. Received it January 11, 2019, never opened the box until we moved in on February 15, 2019. Didn’t want to unpack to repack it again. Opened it today Plugged it in and NOTHING - brand new, box sealed and it doesn’t work at all. Trying to return through Amazon but the return window was 5 days ago. Left the seller a message but no response. Advice to future buyers - open and make sure it works. Should have opened it. Don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Joni P

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell what setting it should be on
customer_reviews.text: We get thick bagels - have toasted them on level 5 on the bagel setting and the usual setting. Neither toasts well on the first go - you have to put them back in. Sometimes Level 3 will toast well, sometimes you have to use level 4. I miss my old toaster and wish I had bought something different ADDENDUM After leaving a two star review the company did EVERYTHING to make this right. A replacement worked out a lot better and I am more than satisfied with the product and the awesome aftersales.
customer_reviews.author: Usamackem

customer_reviews.title: Better toast while it lasted... but that wasn't long
customer_reviews.text: Weird as it sounds, the toast from this toaster is toasted throughout, rather than just on the outside; it's kind of hard to explain. Toast takes a bit longer-- but it really is better toast. We took a chance on a slightly more expensive toaster, something we would normally just grab randomly at Kmart, and we read reviews, and now we have better, tastier toast. The bagel setting toasts only on the side facing the center of the slots, and that works fine. It's larger than the average toaster-- check the dimensions and size of your countertop. CHANGING TO 2 STARS--- WONDERFUL WHILE IT LASTED, BUT HALF THE ELEMENTS STOPPED WORKING IN A LITTLE OVER A YEAR.
customer_reviews.author: the eternal answering machine

customer_reviews.title: Excitement turned to disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: My MIL really wanted my 4-slice toaster and wasn't satisfied with the brand new one that I had bought her. So I gave her my toaster. However that left my son sad because he wanted to have toast, so I came on Amazon to research and purchase a new 4-slice toaster for us. My sons and I were really excited waiting patiently for this toaster to arrive, only to be disappointed when we opened the box. One of the sliding crumb trays was popped out and would not click in to hold closed properly like the other side. Waiting another 2 weeks for a replacement sucks.
customer_reviews.author: BHerUSA

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Company and Item
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am very impressed with this company. It was a toss up between this toaster and another that looks just like it and was about the same price. I am glad I chose this company. I did have an issue with the toaster sent and contacted the manufacturer. The company addressed my issue immediately. The toaster works VERY well; bread and bagels fit, there is even toasting, no burning, nice length of a cord, light weight product that doesn't take up a lot of counter space, and it is easy to clean. I would definitely purchase other items from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, crumb tray broke after 15 uses
customer_reviews.text: The toaster has a very cheap crump tray secure latch. It broke after using around 15 times. It has very cheap 116 inch plastic pressure pinch securement latch. Toaster will not work without this secured. It is a very good looking toaster and outside of this MAJOR flaw, it works very well. I really liked it until cleaning it one day it wouldn"t go back together. Very very cheap latch. Toaster does what they advertise, looks great, all knobs work as expected, just a worthless little latch that makes it worthless
customer_reviews.author: khbeacham

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, it was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance and features of this toaster. But, I'm returning it because mine randomly doesn't toast one side. I don't know if that's because of a loose connection, bagel function activating itself or item not staying centered. I only used it 5 times (bread) and twice one side wasn't toasted. Gun shy now so ordering a different toaster to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Daddy

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: Purchased toaster in October 2019. Toaster quit working properly in March 2019 - 6 months after purchasing it. Control lever would not stay down. Toaster will work if I hold the control lever down. Too late to return to Amazon for refund. Sent seller an email through Amazon 7 days ago. Have yet to hear from seller about warranty. I see that the item is no longer available through Amazon. Hope this was not a "quick sell item for a quick profit".
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Toasts evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Good toaster. Looks nice. On the down side, the top surface has a slot running the entire diameter of the toaster and it will catch any and all crumbs...the larger crumbs must be dug out...the others fall to the bottom of the toaster and can be dumped. Another "problem" it the bagel setting...it just toasts longer. Most bagel settings toast only one side of the bagel slice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year. About 6 mos in, the release button stopped working, so you have to pull up on the lever, which takes some force. A month or so ago, it started burning toast some of the time, even though on a low setting. It's like the timer works intermittently. I would have given it 2 stars, but I realize this was a cheap toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Green12

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster for a sweet price.
customer_reviews.text: With any appliances I wait a bit before posting a review. Happily, I can still give this one 4 stars. It's quick to toast... toast, and so simple my 6 year old has mastered it. Most importantly, it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works great. Evenly toasts bread on each side. Easy to clean the exterior and very modern looking. There are two bread crumb trays at the back of the toaster that slide in and out easily by pressing on them. My only suggestion would be to have these trays at the front of the toaster so you wouldn’t have to pull the toaster away from the wall to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: I love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase. My family loves to eat toasted bread for the breakfast and this is a perfect buy. It enhances my kitchen counter with its stainless steel body. The crumb tray beneath the toaster is a perfect way of cleaning the toaster, which was absent in my previous toaster. There are various option according to your style of toasting the bread. Also, there is a separate option for toasting a bagel and defrosting freezer items. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Atul

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: First off, I like the looks of this toaster. It seems to work really well. My old toaster had narrow slots and it was very hard to toast bagels but this toaster has wide slots and easy to toast both bread and bagels. Push up feature for small items is great as well. Finally I have a toaster that doesn’t burn my toast. This is one of the best toasters I have ever owned. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: BREVO 2-Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster for Bagel Breakfast with Brushed Stainless Steel Reheat Defrost 7-Shade Control
feature_bullets: 1.5” EXTRA WIDE: Perfect toasts bagels and thick breads.
CLEAN HASSLE FREE: Removable crumb tray stays your counter crumb-free.
7 SHADE SELECTOR: 7 selectable shade setting offers a full range of browning options to allow perfect customization of any piece of bread.
STYLISH DESIGN: The whole stainless steel sleek body brings a luxury experience at each morning breakfast.
ETL APPROVED: 1-year manufacturer warranty, we promise your money back or replacement with no questions asked or charge
